agents.agent module¶

class agents.agent.Agent(data_path)¶

Bases: object

Manage the agent’s internals (e.g. neural network for DQN/DDQN, or q-table for Q-table) and maintain a logger to record the outcomes the agent achieves.

finish_subject(strategy, transfer_strategy)¶

  • transfer_strategy –

get_last_attempt_results()¶
setup_subject(human=False, participant_id=-1, age=-1, gender='robot', handedness='none', eyewear='no', major='robotics', random_seed=None)¶

Set internal variables for subject, initialize logger, and create a copy of the code base for reproduction.

Parameters:
  • human – True if human agent, default: False
  • participant_id – default: -1
  • age – default: -1
  • gender – default: ‘robot’
  • handedness – default: ‘none’
  • eyewear – default: ‘no’
  • major – default: ‘robotics’
  • random_seed – default: None
Returns:

Nothing

  • random_seed – default: None
